document_data.mainbody:
ail Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Sail Street originated in the Dock Ward where Dock Street met Fishgut Court. The road passed west into the Castle Ward near the waterfront to end at the junction with Coin Alley. Sail Street was intersected by Lion Street, Tarnished Silver Alley, Lackpurse Lane, Sakiirs Street, and Belnimbras Street.
* The Sailors Own
